dataset_id: IceBridge Photon Counting Lidar L1B Subset Geolocated Photon Elevations V001
title: IceBridge Photon Counting Lidar L1B Subset Geolocated Photon Elevations V001
summary: This data set contains nadir photon counting data captured over Antarctica using the Sigma Space photon counting lidar. Position and orientation data are included. The data were collected by scientists working on the International Collaborative Exploration of the Cryosphere through Airborne Profiling (ICECAP) project, which was funded by the National Science Foundation (NSF), the Antarctic Climate and Ecosystems Collaborative Research Center, and the Natural Environment Research Council (NERC) with additional support from NASA Operation IceBridge.
